name: UTUUJIN
description:
Small 10-15 minute puzzle adventure game written in VB for my SDD assignment. Much of the aesthetic was inspired by Yume Nikki.

You play as an alien finding their way to their spaceship, solving a series of puzzles to get there.

The game was written over the span of a week and as such it lacks much content and bugs may occur. The source code is available at:

https://github.com/sanakanw/utuujin/
